013package org.apache.juneau.dto.swagger;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ArrayUtils.contains;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ConverterUtils.*;
018import static org.apache.juneau.internal.StringUtils.*;
019import java.util.*;
020
021import org.apache.juneau.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.marshaller.*;
025
026/**
027 * Allows the definition of a security scheme that can be used by the operations.
028 *
029 * <p>
030 * Supported schemes are basic authentication, an API key (either as a header or as a query parameter) and OAuth2's
031 * common flows (implicit, password, application and access code).
032 *
033 * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
034 * <p class='bjson'>
035 *    <jc>// Basic authentication sample</jc>
036 *    {
037 *       <js>"type"</js>: <js>"basic"</js>
038 *    }
039 *
040 *    <jc>// API key sample</jc>
041 *    {
042 *       <js>"type"</js>: <js>"apiKey"</js>,
043 *       <js>"name"</js>: <js>"api_key"</js>,
044 *       <js>"in"</js>: <js>"header"</js>
045 *    }
046 *
047 *    <jc>// Implicit OAuth2 sample</jc>
048 *    {
049 *       <js>"type"</js>: <js>"oauth2"</js>,
050 *       <js>"authorizationUrl"</js>: <js>"http://swagger.io/api/oauth/dialog"</js>,
051 *       <js>"flow"</js>: <js>"implicit"</js>,
052 *       <js>"scopes"</js>: {
053 *          <js>"write:pets"</js>: <js>"modify pets in your account"</js>,
054 *          <js>"read:pets"</js>: <js>"read your pets"</js>
055 *       }
056 *    }
057 * </p>
058 *
059 * <ul class='seealso'>
060 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-rest-server.jrs.Swagger">Overview &gt; juneau-rest-server &gt; Swagger</a>
061 * </ul>
062 */
063@Bean(properties="type,description,name,in,flow,authorizationUrl,tokenUrl,scopes,*")
064@FluentSetters
065public class SecurityScheme extends SwaggerElement {
066
067   private static final String[] VALID_TYPES = {"basic", "apiKey", "oauth2"};
068
069   private String
070      type,
071      description,
072      name,
073      in,
074      flow,
075      authorizationUrl,
076      tokenUrl;
077   private Map<String,String> scopes;
078
079   /**
080    * Default constructor.
081    */
082   public SecurityScheme() {}
083
084   /**
085    * Copy constructor.
086    *
087    * @param copyFrom The object to copy.
088    */
089   public SecurityScheme(SecurityScheme copyFrom) {
090      super(copyFrom);
091
092      this.authorizationUrl = copyFrom.authorizationUrl;
093      this.description = copyFrom.description;
094      this.flow = copyFrom.flow;
095      this.in = copyFrom.in;
096      this.name = copyFrom.name;
097      this.scopes = copyOf(copyFrom.scopes);
098      this.tokenUrl = copyFrom.tokenUrl;
099      this.type = copyFrom.type;
100   }
101
102   /**
103    * Make a deep copy of this object.
104    *
105    * @return A deep copy of this object.
106    */
107   public SecurityScheme copy() {
108      return new SecurityScheme(this);
109   }
110
111
112   @Override /* SwaggerElement */
113   protected SecurityScheme strict() {
114      super.strict();
115      return this;
116   }
117
118   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
119   // Properties
120   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
121
122   /**
123    * Bean property getter:  <property>authorizationUrl</property>.
124    *
125    * <p>
126    * The authorization URL to be used for this flow.
127    *
128    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
129    */
130   public String getAuthorizationUrl() {
131      return authorizationUrl;
132   }
133
134   /**
135    * Bean property setter:  <property>authorizationUrl</property>.
136    *
137    * <p>
138    * The authorization URL to be used for this flow.
139    *
140    * @param value
141    *    The new value for this property.
142    *    <br>This SHOULD be in the form of a URL.
143    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
144    * @return This object.
145    */
146   public SecurityScheme setAuthorizationUrl(String value) {
147      authorizationUrl = value;
148      return this;
149   }
150
151   /**
152    * Bean property getter:  <property>description</property>.
153    *
154    * <p>
155    * A short description for security scheme.
156    *
157    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
158    */
159   public String getDescription() {
160      return description;
161   }
162
163   /**
164    * Bean property setter:  <property>description</property>.
165    *
166    * <p>
167    * A short description for security scheme.
168    *
169    * @param value
170    *    The new value for this property.
171    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
172    * @return This object.
173    */
174   public SecurityScheme setDescription(String value) {
175      description = value;
176      return this;
177   }
178
179   /**
180    * Bean property getter:  <property>flow</property>.
181    *
182    * <p>
183    * The flow used by the OAuth2 security scheme.
184    *
185    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
186    */
187   public String getFlow() {
188      return flow;
189   }
190
191   /**
192    * Bean property setter:  <property>flow</property>.
193    *
194    * <p>
195    * The flow used by the OAuth2 security scheme.
196    *
197    * @param value
198    *    The new value for this property.
199    *    <br>Valid values:
200    *    <ul>
201    *       <li><js>"implicit"</js>
202    *       <li><js>"password"</js>
203    *       <li><js>"application"</js>
204    *       <li><js>"accessCode"</js>
205    *    </ul>
206    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
207    * @return This object.
208    */
209   public SecurityScheme setFlow(String value) {
210      flow = value;
211      return this;
212   }
213
214   /**
215    * Bean property getter:  <property>in</property>.
216    *
217    * <p>
218    * The location of the API key.
219    *
220    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
221    */
222   public String getIn() {
223      return in;
224   }
225
226   /**
227    * Bean property setter:  <property>in</property>.
228    *
229    * <p>
230    * The location of the API key.
231    *
232    * @param value
233    *    The new value for this property.
234    *    <br>Valid values:
235    *    <ul>
236    *       <li><js>"query"</js>
237    *       <li><js>"header"</js>
238    *    </ul>
239    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
240    * @return This object.
241    */
242   public SecurityScheme setIn(String value) {
243      in = value;
244      return this;
245   }
246
247   /**
248    * Bean property getter:  <property>name</property>.
249    *
250    * <p>
251    * The name of the header or query parameter to be used.
252    *
253    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
254    */
255   public String getName() {
256      return name;
257   }
258
259   /**
260    * Bean property setter:  <property>name</property>.
261    *
262    * <p>
263    * The name of the header or query parameter to be used.
264    *
265    * @param value
266    *    The new value for this property.
267    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
268    * @return This object.
269    */
270   public SecurityScheme setName(String value) {
271      name = value;
272      return this;
273   }
274
275   /**
276    * Bean property getter:  <property>scopes</property>.
277    *
278    * <p>
279    * The available scopes for the OAuth2 security scheme.
280    *
281    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
282    */
283   public Map<String,String> getScopes() {
284      return scopes;
285   }
286
287   /**
288    * Bean property setter:  <property>scopes</property>.
289    *
290    * <p>
291    * The available scopes for the OAuth2 security scheme.
292    *
293    * @param value
294    *    The new value for this property.
295    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
296    * @return This object.
297    */
298   public SecurityScheme setScopes(Map<String,String> value) {
299      scopes = copyOf(value);
300      return this;
301   }
302
303   /**
304    * Bean property appender:  <property>scopes</property>.
305    *
306    * <p>
307    * The available scopes for the OAuth2 security scheme.
308    *
309    * @param key The scope key.
310    * @param value The scope value.
311    * @return This object.
312    */
313   public SecurityScheme addScope(String key, String value) {
314      scopes = mapBuilder(scopes).sparse().add(key, value).build();
315      return this;
316   }
317
318   /**
319    * Bean property getter:  <property>tokenUrl</property>.
320    *
321    * <p>
322    * The token URL to be used for this flow.
323    *
324    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
325    */
326   public String getTokenUrl() {
327      return tokenUrl;
328   }
329
330   /**
331    * Bean property setter:  <property>tokenUrl</property>.
332    *
333    * <p>
334    * The token URL to be used for this flow.
335    *
336    * @param value
337    *    The new value for this property.
338    *    <br>This SHOULD be in the form of a URL.
339    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
340    * @return This object.
341    */
342   public SecurityScheme setTokenUrl(String value) {
343      tokenUrl = value;
344      return this;
345   }
346
347   /**
348    * Bean property getter:  <property>type</property>.
349    *
350    * <p>
351    * The type of the security scheme.
352    *
353    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
354    */
355   public String getType() {
356      return type;
357   }
358
359   /**
360    * Bean property setter:  <property>type</property>.
361    *
362    * <p>
363    * The type of the security scheme.
364    *
365    * @param value
366    *    The new value for this property.
367    *    <br>Valid values:
368    *    <ul>
369    *       <li><js>"basic"</js>
370    *       <li><js>"apiKey"</js>
371    *       <li><js>"oauth2"</js>
372    *    </ul>
373    *    <br>Property value is required.
374    * @return This object.
375    */
376   public SecurityScheme setType(String value) {
377      if (isStrict() && ! contains(value, VALID_TYPES))
378         throw new BasicRuntimeException(
379            "Invalid value passed in to setType(String).  Value=''{0}'', valid values={1}",
380            value, Json5.of(VALID_TYPES)
381         );
382      type = value;
383      return this;
384   }
385
386   // <FluentSetters>
387
388   // </FluentSetters>
389
390   @Override /* SwaggerElement */
391   public <T> T get(String property, Class<T> type) {
392      if (property == null)
393         return null;
394      switch (property) {
395         case "authorizationUrl": return toType(getAuthorizationUrl(), type);
396         case "description": return toType(getDescription(), type);
397         case "flow": return toType(getFlow(), type);
398         case "in": return toType(getIn(), type);
399         case "name": return toType(getName(), type);
400         case "scopes": return toType(getScopes(), type);
401         case "tokenUrl": return toType(getTokenUrl(), type);
402         case "type": return toType(getType(), type);
403         default: return super.get(property, type);
404      }
405   }
406
407   @Override /* SwaggerElement */
408   public SecurityScheme set(String property, Object value) {
409      if (property == null)
410         return this;
411      switch (property) {
412         case "authorizationUrl": return setAuthorizationUrl(stringify(value));
413         case "description": return setDescription(stringify(value));
414         case "flow": return setFlow(stringify(value));
415         case "in": return setIn(stringify(value));
416         case "name": return setName(stringify(value));
417         case "scopes": return setScopes(mapBuilder(String.class,String.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
418         case "tokenUrl": return setTokenUrl(stringify(value));
419         case "type": return setType(stringify(value));
420         default:
421            super.set(property, value);
422            return this;
423      }
424   }
425
426   @Override /* SwaggerElement */
427   public Set<String> keySet() {
428      Set<String> s = setBuilder(String.class)
429         .addIf(authorizationUrl != null, "authorizationUrl")
430         .addIf(description != null, "description")
431         .addIf(flow != null, "flow")
432         .addIf(in != null, "in")
433         .addIf(name != null, "name")
434         .addIf(scopes != null, "scopes")
435         .addIf(tokenUrl != null, "tokenUrl")
436         .addIf(type != null, "type")
437         .build();
438      return new MultiSet<>(s, super.keySet());
439   }
440}
